ingredients.ingredient: 1 large delicata squash - ends trimmed, halved lengthwise, seeded

cookingTips: Roast squash cut-side down first for 20 minutes to caramelize the flesh
Flip and roast cut-side up for another 15-20 minutes until fork-tender and browned
The thin delicata skin is edible when roasted, providing extra nutrients and texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you use two-sided roasting to develop both caramelization and tenderness in winter squash?
